title: [GAMEPLAY] Dragonblade Riven Skin Is Clunky
body:
So I had the Dragonblade Riven skin for 2 months already and I thought it was me for a second but her skill animations felt slow/hard to use. 

Like (When I play it)
1. When you use Riven's Q it feels heavy/slow than the default riven and the default one is much lighter and faster 
2. Most of her moves feel heavy for skin
3. Animation Cancels also feel kinda heavy 

And I think there's more but I haven't played Riven ever since because of this problem so please fix!! I want to continue using the skin since I bought it for a reason and ya xD


{{champion:92}}

replies.body:
Hey EternalBoom165 -

This is working as intended. We've had several players test this skin, and the difference here is the sound on the (Q). Similarly, Arcade Riven has a different sound, too. It's a matter of getting used to the different sounds.

hey KateyKhaos, i am a riven mainer aswell who plays with dragonblade Riven, i am having the same problem, ive used this skin for 200+, im not playing with sounds tho and im still experiening the same problem too. (i know this is kinda late, i just dont think its the sounds tbh)

Hey there - 

We've done checks on this skin before, because this isn't the first time her (Q) has been brought up. It's using the same animation set as the base, and isn't playing any differently. I'm not sure what would be causing you to feel a different at this point. :c
Are you sure?? I mean I didn't say anything about the sounds... I mean't the gameplay itself :/

I'm sure. 

The animations are the same as the other skins, which means the gameplay is also identical. The only difference here are the sounds, which, as I've mentioned above, may throw you off if you haven't played with the skin before.
I do have the skin but that's ok I guess :P.
